2. Oestrogens - These are a class of steroid hormones that are primarily secreted by the ovaries of female vertebrates. They are essential for the development and maintenance of female reproductive systems and secondary sexual characteristics.
3. Progestogens - These are a class of steroid hormones that are secreted by the ovaries and placenta. They play a crucial role in the menstrual cycle and pregnancy.
